attributes.action: Reduce uniform rules so students can express themselves within reason.
attributes.additional_details: Me and other feels trapped and feel as if we can’t be ourselves
attributes.background: Many schools and teachers believe this looks best for their schools but it’s actually creating a more depressing environment for students. Changing rules will Lead to happier children with a better mental state

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "within reason".

Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234997
